title: WM Seditionist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Prepare a speech during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you prepare a speech, you will inspire your fellow Mafia, including yourself, the following night.
- Being inspired temporarily gives all Mafia members roleblock and redirect immunity.
- When the Mafia are inspired, members may use the ability of a dead Mafia member instead of their own; however, they cannot use the abilities of Mafia Head roles.
- You may only prepare two speeches and cannot prepare them two days in a row.

desc:
Post 313
*We the members of the Mafia, in order to form an even more perfect Union...*
